# dobot

> 

# Usage

# dobot

## Installation

```
pip install dobot
```

With [`uv`](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/):

```
uv tool install dobot
```

## Running

```
# start robot
uv run robot
# start controller
uv run controller
# start both together
uv run robot &; uv run controller
```
# API

# dobot
